from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT
                            AppealsEventId
                            ,eventId
                            ,caseReference
                            ,eventType
                            ,eventName
                            ,eventstatus as eventStatus
                            ,isUrgent
                            ,eventPublished
                            ,eventStartDatetime
                            ,eventEndDatetime
                            ,notificationOfSitevisit
                            ,AddressLine1 as addressLine1
                            ,AddressLine2 as addressLine2
                            ,AddressTown as addressTown
                            ,AddressCounty as addressCounty
                            ,AddressPostcode as addressPostcode
                            ,Migrated
                            ,ODTSourceSystem
                            ,SourceSystemID 
                            ,IngestionDate
                            ,ValidTo
                            ,RowID
                            ,IsActive
                    FROM {service_bus_table} AS Service_Bus

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                        CAST(NULL AS LONG) as AppealsEventId
                        ,CONCAT(casenumber, '-',eventId) AS eventId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,eventType
                        ,eventName
                        ,eventStatus
                        ,CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as isUrgent
                        ,CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as eventPublished
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) as eventStartDatetime
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String)  as eventEndDatetime
                        ,notificationOfSitevisit
                        ,eventaddressline1 as addressLine1
                        ,eventaddressline2 as addressLine2
                        ,eventaddresstown as addressTown
                        ,eventaddresscounty as addressCounty
                        ,eventaddresspostcode as addressPostcode
                        ,0 AS Migrated
                        ,'Horizon' AS ODTSourceSystem
                        ,9 AS SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
                        ,ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS ValidTo
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
                FROM {horizon_table} AS Horizon
     WHERE ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table}) """)
#sort columns into same order as service bus
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_appeal_event_calculations_base AS
    SELECT  
        row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
        ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, {primary_key} asc) AS AppealsEventId
        ,{primary_key}
        ,IngestionDate
        ,ValidTo
        ,'0' AS Migrated
        ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
            WHEN 1 THEN
                'Y'
            ELSE
                'N'
            END AS IsActive                
    FROM
    {spark_table_final}

df_calcs = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.AppealsEventId 
                            ,CurrentRow.{primary_key}  
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,NextRow.IngestionDate AS ValidTo 
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.{primary_key}  IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_appeal_event_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_appeal_event_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.{primary_key}  = NextRow.{primary_key} 
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT eventId FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.{primary_key}  = Raw.{primary_key}  
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        AppealsEventId
                        ,{primary_key}
                        ,caseReference
                        ,eventType
                        ,eventName
                        ,eventStatus
                        ,isUrgent
                        ,eventPublished
                        ,eventStartDatetime
                        ,eventEndDatetime
                        ,notificationOfSitevisit
                        ,addressLine1
                        ,addressLine2
                        ,addressTown
                        ,addressCounty
                        ,addressPostcode 
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,SourceSystemID -- ID for appeals in odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(CAST(AppealsEventId AS bigint), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventId AS string), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventType AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventStatus AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(isUrgent AS STRING), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventPublished AS STRING), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventStartDatetime AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(eventEndDatetime AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(notificationOfSitevisit AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(addressLine1 AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(addressLine2 AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(addressTown AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(addressCounty AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(addressPostcode AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(IsActive AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")
